vernac_cmds: Lemma eval_lvalue_ptr : forall {CS: compspecs} rho m e (Delta: tycontext) te ve ge, mkEnviron ge ve te = rho -> typecheck_var_environ ve (var_types Delta) -> typecheck_glob_environ ge (glob_types Delta) -> denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta e) rho m -> exists base, exists ofs, eval_lvalue e rho = Vptr base ofs.
induction e; eauto; try now inversion H2.
subst rho; simpl ve_of; simpl ge_of.
destruct_var_types i eqn:H4&?H; rewrite H4 in H2; [| destruct_glob_types i eqn:?H&?H; rewrite H6 in H2 ].
destruct (eval_expr e rho); simpl; try now inversion H4; eauto.
inversion H4; subst x i0; clear H4.
destruct (typeof e); try now inversion H3.
destruct (field_offset cenv_cs i (co_members co)); [| inv H3].

Ltac unfold_tc_denote := unfold denote_tc_nonzero in *; unfold isptr in *; unfold denote_tc_igt in *; unfold denote_tc_Zle in *; unfold denote_tc_Zge in *; unfold denote_tc_samebase in *; unfold denote_tc_nodivover in *; unfold denote_tc_initialized in *.

Lemma typecheck_lvalue_Evar: forall {CS: compspecs} i t pt Delta rho m, typecheck_environ Delta rho -> denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta (Evar i t)) rho m -> is_pointer_type pt = true -> tc_val pt (eval_lvalue (Evar i t) rho).
destruct_var_types i; rewrite ?Heqo, ?Heqo0 in *; try rewrite eqb_type_eq in *; simpl in *; intuition.
destruct pt; try solve [inv H1; auto].
destruct_glob_types i; rewrite ?Heqo1, ?Heqo2 in *; [| inv H0].
destruct b0; simpl in *; [| inv H0].
unfold tc_val; unfold is_pointer_type in H1; destruct pt; try solve [inv H1; reflexivity].

Lemma typecheck_expr_sound_Efield: forall {CS: compspecs} Delta rho e i t m (H: typecheck_environ Delta rho) (IHe: (denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta e) rho m -> tc_val (typeof e) (eval_expr e rho)) /\ (forall pt : type, denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta e) rho m -> is_pointer_type pt = true -> tc_val pt (eval_lvalue e rho))) (H0: denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta (Efield e i t)) rho m), tc_val (typeof (Efield e i t)) (eval_expr (Efield e i t) rho).
assert (MODE: access_mode t = By_reference) by (destruct (access_mode t); auto; hnf in H0; try contradiction).
assert (PTR := eval_lvalue_ptr _ _ e Delta te ve ge (eq_refl _) Hve Hge H0).
clear - MODE; destruct t; try destruct i; try destruct s; try destruct f; inv MODE; simpl; auto.
destruct (typeof e); try now inv H3.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H3.
destruct (field_offset cenv_cs i (co_members co)); try now inv H3.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H.
destruct t; auto; try inversion H2.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H3.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H.

Lemma typecheck_lvalue_sound_Efield: forall {CS: compspecs} Delta rho m e i t pt (H: typecheck_environ Delta rho) (IHe: (denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta e) rho m -> tc_val (typeof e) (eval_expr e rho)) /\ (forall pt0 : type, denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta e) rho m -> is_pointer_type pt0 = true -> tc_val pt0 (eval_lvalue e rho))) (H0: denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta (Efield e i t)) rho m) (H1: is_pointer_type pt = true), tc_val pt (eval_lvalue (Efield e i t) rho).
assert (PTR := eval_lvalue_ptr _ m e _ te _ _ (eq_refl _) H H7 H0).
destruct (typeof e); try now inv H2.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H2.
destruct (field_offset cenv_cs i (co_members co)); try now inv H2.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H6.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H2.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H6.

Lemma typecheck_expr_sound_Evar: forall {CS: compspecs} Delta rho m i t, typecheck_environ Delta rho -> denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta (Evar i t)) rho m -> tc_val (typeof (Evar i t)) (eval_expr (Evar i t) rho).
assert (MODE: access_mode t = By_reference) by (unfold typecheck_expr in H0; destruct (access_mode t); try (hnf in H0; contradiction); auto).
destruct_var_types i; rewrite ?Heqo, ?Heqo0 in *; try rewrite eqb_type_eq in *; simpl in *; intuition.
destruct t0; try destruct i0; try destruct s; try destruct f; inv MODE; simpl; auto.
destruct_glob_types i; rewrite ?Heqo1, ?Heqo2 in *; [| inv H0].
destruct b0; simpl in *; [| inv H0].
destruct t0 as [| [| | |] [|] | | [|] | | | | |]; inv MODE; simpl; auto.

Definition unOp_result_type op t := match op with | Cop.Onotbool =>match t with | Tint _ _ _ => Tint IBool Signed noattr | Tlong _ _ => Tint IBool Signed noattr | Tpointer _ _ => Tint I32 Signed noattr | Tfloat _ _ => Tint IBool Signed noattr | Tarray _ _ _ => Tint IBool Signed noattr | Tfunction _ _ _ => Tint IBool Signed noattr | _ => Tvoid end | Cop.Onotint => match t with | Tint _ _ _ => Tint I32 Signed noattr | Tlong _ _ => Tlong Signed noattr | _ => Tvoid end | Cop.Oneg => match t with | Tint _ _ _ => Tint I32 Signed noattr | Tlong _ _ => Tlong Signed noattr | Tfloat _ _ => t | _ => Tvoid end | Cop.Oabsfloat => t end.
Lemma tc_bool_e: forall {CS: compspecs} b a rho m, app_pred (denote_tc_assert (tc_bool b a) rho) m -> b = true.
destruct b; simpl in H; auto.
Lemma tc_val_of_bool_int_type: forall b t, is_int_type t = true -> tc_val t (Val.of_bool b).
destruct t as [ | [ | | | ] [ | ] | | [ | ] | | | | | ]; try inv H; destruct b; simpl; try split; auto; rewrite <- Z.leb_le; reflexivity.

Lemma typecheck_unop_sound: forall {CS: compspecs} Delta rho m u e t (H: typecheck_environ Delta rho) (IHe: (denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta e) rho m -> tc_val (typeof e) (eval_expr e rho)) /\ (forall pt : type, denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta e) rho m -> is_pointer_type pt = true -> tc_val pt (eval_lvalue e rho))) (H0: denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta (Eunop u e t)) rho m), tc_val t (eval_expr (Eunop u e t) rho).

destruct u; unfold tc_val in H2; simpl in H0; unfold sem_notbool, sem_notint, sem_neg, sem_absfloat, bool_val in *; super_unfold_lift; simpl; destruct (typeof e) as [ | [ | | | ] [ | ] | | [ | ] | | | | | ]; try contradiction; repeat match goal with | H: app_pred (denote_tc_assert (tc_andp _ _) _) _ |- _ => rewrite denote_tc_assert_andp in H; destruct H | H: app_pred (denote_tc_assert (tc_bool _ _) _) _ |- _ => apply tc_bool_e in H | H: app_pred (denote_tc_assert (tc_int_or_ptr_type _) _) _ |- _ => apply tc_bool_e in H | H: (if eqb_type ?T1 ?T2 then _ else _) _ |- _ => let J := fresh "J" in destruct (eqb_type T1 T2) eqn:J; [apply eqb_type_true in J | apply eqb_type_false in J] end; destruct (eval_expr e rho) eqn:?; try contradiction; try discriminate; try solve [apply tc_val_of_bool_int_type; auto].

all: try solve [ destruct t as [ | [ | | | ] [ | ] | | [ | ] | | | | | ]; match goal with H: _ _ = true |- _ => inv H end; try reflexivity; auto; simpl tc_val; try split; auto; rewrite <- Z.leb_le; reflexivity].
Lemma same_base_tc_val : forall v t1 t2, same_base_type t1 t2 = true -> tc_val t1 v -> tc_val t2 v.

destruct t1; destruct t2; try destruct f; try destruct f0; try destruct f1; unfold tc_val in *; try match type of H0 with (if ?A then _ else _) _ => destruct A eqn:?J; [apply eqb_type_true in J | apply eqb_type_false in J] end; try solve [inv H]; destruct v; auto; try solve [inv H0]; try solve [simple_if_tac; apply I].

Lemma typecheck_temp_sound: forall {CS: compspecs} Delta rho m i t, typecheck_environ Delta rho -> denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta (Etempvar i t)) rho m -> tc_val (typeof (Etempvar i t)) (eval_expr (Etempvar i t) rho).
symmetry in Heqb; eapply neutral_cast_subsumption; eauto.
destruct (same_base_type t0 t) eqn:?; [ | inv H0].

Lemma typecheck_deref_sound: forall {CS: compspecs} Delta rho m e t pt, typecheck_environ Delta rho -> (denote_tc_assert (typecheck_expr Delta e) rho m -> tc_val (typeof e) (eval_expr e rho)) /\ (forall pt0 : type, denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta e) rho m -> is_pointer_type pt0 = true -> tc_val pt0 (eval_lvalue e rho)) -> denote_tc_assert (typecheck_lvalue Delta (Ederef e t)) rho m -> is_pointer_type pt = true -> tc_val pt (eval_lvalue (Ederef e t) rho).
revert H2; case_eq (is_pointer_type (typeof e)); intros; hnf in H2; try contradiction.
unfold_lift in H3; hnf in H3.
destruct pt; try solve [inv H1; reflexivity].
destruct (eqb_type (Tpointer pt a) int_or_ptr_type); inv H1.

command: induction e; eauto; try now inversion H2.
subst rho; simpl ve_of; simpl ge_of.
destruct_var_types i eqn:H4&?H; rewrite H4 in H2; [| destruct_glob_types i eqn:?H&?H; rewrite H6 in H2 ].
destruct (eval_expr e rho); simpl; try now inversion H4; eauto.
inversion H4; subst x i0; clear H4.
destruct (typeof e); try now inversion H3.
destruct (field_offset cenv_cs i (co_members co)); [| inv H3].
destruct_var_types i; rewrite ?Heqo, ?Heqo0 in *; try rewrite eqb_type_eq in *; simpl in *; intuition.
destruct pt; try solve [inv H1; auto].
destruct_glob_types i; rewrite ?Heqo1, ?Heqo2 in *; [| inv H0].
destruct b0; simpl in *; [| inv H0].
unfold tc_val; unfold is_pointer_type in H1; destruct pt; try solve [inv H1; reflexivity].
assert (MODE: access_mode t = By_reference) by (destruct (access_mode t); auto; hnf in H0; try contradiction).
assert (PTR := eval_lvalue_ptr _ _ e Delta te ve ge (eq_refl _) Hve Hge H0).
clear - MODE; destruct t; try destruct i; try destruct s; try destruct f; inv MODE; simpl; auto.
destruct (typeof e); try now inv H3.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H3.
destruct (field_offset cenv_cs i (co_members co)); try now inv H3.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H.
destruct t; auto; try inversion H2.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H3.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H.
assert (PTR := eval_lvalue_ptr _ m e _ te _ _ (eq_refl _) H H7 H0).
destruct (typeof e); try now inv H2.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H2.
destruct (field_offset cenv_cs i (co_members co)); try now inv H2.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H6.
destruct (cenv_cs ! i0) as [co |]; try now inv H2.
destruct (eval_lvalue e (mkEnviron ge ve te)); try now inv H6.
assert (MODE: access_mode t = By_reference) by (unfold typecheck_expr in H0; destruct (access_mode t); try (hnf in H0; contradiction); auto).
destruct_var_types i; rewrite ?Heqo, ?Heqo0 in *; try rewrite eqb_type_eq in *; simpl in *; intuition.
destruct t0; try destruct i0; try destruct s; try destruct f; inv MODE; simpl; auto.
destruct_glob_types i; rewrite ?Heqo1, ?Heqo2 in *; [| inv H0].
destruct b0; simpl in *; [| inv H0].
destruct t0 as [| [| | |] [|] | | [|] | | | | |]; inv MODE; simpl; auto.
destruct b; simpl in H; auto.
destruct t as [ | [ | | | ] [ | ] | | [ | ] | | | | | ]; try inv H; destruct b; simpl; try split; auto; rewrite <- Z.leb_le; reflexivity.

destruct t1; destruct t2; try destruct f; try destruct f0; try destruct f1; unfold tc_val in *; try match type of H0 with (if ?A then _ else _) _ => destruct A eqn:?J; [apply eqb_type_true in J | apply eqb_type_false in J] end; try solve [inv H]; destruct v; auto; try solve [inv H0]; try solve [simple_if_tac; apply I].
symmetry in Heqb; eapply neutral_cast_subsumption; eauto.
destruct (same_base_type t0 t) eqn:?; [ | inv H0].
revert H2; case_eq (is_pointer_type (typeof e)); intros; hnf in H2; try contradiction.
unfold_lift in H3; hnf in H3.
destruct pt; try solve [inv H1; reflexivity].
destruct (eqb_type (Tpointer pt a) int_or_ptr_type); inv H1.
